newsitem.title: USA: Trans World Airlines matches sale fares.
newsitem.headline: Trans World Airlines matches sale fares.

text.p: Trans World Airlines Inc said Monday it cut fares for travel over the U.S. Thanksgiving holiday, matching sale prices offered by other airlines.
AMR Corp's American Airlines, Delta Air Lines Inc, and America West Airlines Inc previously announced fare reductions.
TWA said it matched sale fares offered by American and Delta on travel over Thanksgiving, November 28, as well as two offers by America West for discounts on flights through March 23.
